title: Update top two artist names in sample leaderboard data

requirements.summary: Update the first two sample leaderboard artist names to Atif Aslam (rank 1) and Arijit Singh (rank 2) without changing any other fields or the Artist data shape.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/data/artistLeaderboardSample.ts, the entry with rank: 1 has name: "Atif Aslam".
In frontend/src/data/artistLeaderboardSample.ts, the entry with rank: 2 has name: "Arijit Singh" (capitalization exactly as shown).

The Artist Leaderboard page renders these updated names in the first two rows without changing any other fields (id, rank, avatar URL, reachScore, previousReachScore, isTopTrending) for those entries.

file_operations.description: Update only the `name` field for the objects with `rank: 1` and `rank: 2` to "Atif Aslam" and "Arijit Singh" respectively, keeping all other fields and the Artist interface structure unchanged, and making no changes to any other entries.
